education.institution: Sudan University of Science and Technology, Khartoum

highlights: Developed and maintained various admin tools for internal use, ensuring user-friendly interfaces and efficient functionality.
Reduced development time by initiating customizable dashboard theme template, that has been the default starter for new projects. Built with Webpack, SASS and Bootstrap 5.
Enhanced projects delivery by regularly improvising on UI/UX design, ensuring visually appealing and functional interfaces in the absence of a dedicated designer.

Recognized for creativity by fulfilling a special request from HR to design and develop a company-wide tournament game, positively impacting employee engagement. The project built with the new React 18 APIs, HeadlessUI Library and Tailwind.
Provided cross-team support by assisting various teams with front-end development issues, becoming a go-to resource for resolving complex front-end challenges.
Supported backend development by assisting in maintaining a Java-based project when the backend team was fully utilized, ensuring project timelines were met.
Worked closely with the manager to design and implement new features based on functional requirements and specifications
Created custom Angular components for internal framework
Revamped legacy UI components and refactored existing code
Successfully built a reusable Kanban Module using Angular
Worked closely with back-end team to debug and fix ambiguous errors
Provided support to the team lead in mentoring interns and guided them through their projects
Participated in knowledge-sharing sessions to introduce the team to the front-end work and Angular framework specifically
Worked with the team to complete and ship new features in time for a client with a shorter than normal time-frame
Successfully upgraded a web-portal (Angular) from version 8 to 12
